description:
As a registered user,
I want to keep a travel diary and list my visited places in it

As a registered user,
I want to add photos and notes to my travel diary for each place visited.

As a visitor,
I want to consult users' travel and road diaries, made public.

As a regular user,
I want to manage a minimal QuickTrip account to store information in.

As a visitor,
I want to consult tourist offers in the region.

As a visitor,
I want to generate daily tourist routes within a limited radius of 200km and for a cost of less than $500.

As a registered user,
I want to generate tourist routes lasting up to two months.

As a registered user,
I want to generate tourist routes at personalized stages, anywhere in the world.

As a registered user,
I want to restrict my budget for generated trails.

As a registered user,
I want to write travel diaries.

As a registered user,
I want to extract generated routes to edit them as my own logbooks.

As a registered user,
I want to make my road and travel diaries public.

As a registered user,
I want to be suggested a new route by email based on my experience after a month of inactivity.

As a registered user,
I want QuickTrip to reserve everything for a road book, on global payment.

As a visitor,
I want to see the most popular places in a chosen location.
